components.name: DsNgComponent
StorybookToastWrapperComponent
components.template:
<button
  bmbButton
  appearance="primary"
  icon="home"
  size="small"
  position="left"
  [case]="false"
  (click)="onButtonClick()"
>
  Click Here
</button>
<bmb-toast
  [message]="message"
  [appearance]="appearance"
  [duration]="duration"
  [position]="position"
></bmb-toast>
